duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and supervise the 3D and 2D design of Instrumentation engineering including JB specs & termination diagrams, Loop diagram / SWDs, Instrument installation hook ups, and Instrument location layouts.
Ensure the overall quality, reliability, and efficiency of Instrumentation design engineering outputs.
Develop and maintain the LEA standards for Instrumentation design engineering.
Scope Instrumentation Design engineering requirements for project estimate and proposal preparation.
Lead on-site Instrument installation checkout, Site walk downs, commissioning, and plant startup activities.
Provide oversight to Instrument field installation contractors at the job site.
Travel up to 30 to 35% of the time to support project tasks, supplier visits commissioning, and construction.

education_certification.credential: Associate or bachelor’s degree or foreign equivalent in Chemistry major, Control systems, Instrumentation, Electrical, Electronics or Chemical Engineering.
